title: Crime Alert 12.02.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.02.19
description:
When a man doesn't get his chicken sandwich quick enough he makes a scene by dropping his pants and another man drops his binoculars while spying on some coeds!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
